original_text: And he gathered unto him the children of Ammon and Amalek, and went and smote Israel, and possessed the city of palm trees.
korean_text: 에글론이 암몬과 아말렉 자손들을 모아 가지고 와서 이스라엘을 쳐서 종려나무 성읍을 점령한지라

sentences.original_text: And he gathered unto him the children of Ammon
and possessed the city of palm trees
